targets.rawSql: SELECT count() FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT uniq(source_ip_anon) FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT toStartOfHour(timestamp) AS time, count() AS count FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT country_code, count() AS attacks FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND country_code != '' GROUP BY country_code ORDER BY attacks DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT protocol, count() FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY GROUP BY protocol
SELECT attack_tactic, attack_technique, count() FROM honeynet.events WHERE timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND attack_technique != '' GROUP BY attack_tactic, attack_technique
